'''1.0.0''' is the first non-development release of {{el|ee}}, adding all the exclusive features and features from ''[[Windows 10 Edition]]''. It officially launched on November 1, 2016.<ref>https://education.minecraft.net/blog/minecraft-education-edition-available-now/</ref><ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2016/11/minecraft-education-edition-has-launched/</ref> It is available for purchase in 11 languages and 50 countries around the world.

== Additions ==
{{Additions table
|Slate
|Poster
|Board
|Allow
|Deny
|Border
|Portfolio
|Camera
|NPC Spawn Egg
}}
* All features from ''[[Windows 10 Edition]]'' [[Pocket Edition 1.0.0|1.0.0]], which was still in development at the time
** [[Lead]]s and [[horse]]s, additional [[player]] [[skin]]s, [[piston]]s, and the remainder of [[redstone]] functionality and an updated user [[interface]].

=== General === 
'''[[Classroom Mode]]'''
* Simple, Secure Sign-In
* Individual student and teacher logins help identify each player in the game, and ensure data privacy & security while playing [[Minecraft Education|''Minecraft: Education Edition'']].
* Single sign-on (SSO) capabilities are supported, so no additional passwords or accounts are required.

=== Blocks === 
'''[[Chalkboard]]s'''
* Comes in 3 sizes
* Can be written on like [[sign]]s, but can display more text
'''[[Allow]] and [[Deny]] blocks'''
* Used to create restricted building areas
* Allow blocks allow users without the world builder status to place blocks above them
* Only users with the world builder status can place blocks above deny blocks
'''[[Border]]'''
* Prevents players and mobs from passing over or under it

=== Items ===
'''[[Portfolio]]'''
* Can be used to save photos taken by the [[camera]]

=== Entities ===
'''[[Camera]]'''
* An entity that can capture images.
* Collections of pictures can be saved with the [[portfolio]].
'''[[NPC|Non-Player Characters]] (NPC)'''
* Mobs, which a similar look to [[villager]]s
* Will show a "talk" button if the player taps on them
